content: this dishtowel pattern was created as a matching kitchen towel to go with my sophia crochet dishcloth pattern 1 > subscribe to my newsletter 2 to be notified when new patterns come out pattern info stitches used in this pattern single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet finished size of the dishtowel 13 inches wide x 18 inches tall hook size 5 00mm yarn used ~ 242 yards of cotton medium weight 4 yarn for color 1 ~ 28 yards of another cotton medium weight 4 yarn for color 2 you do not need to use two colors for the pattern one will work too you will need around 270 yards if using one color any cotton medium worsted weight yarn will do loops & thread capri eco cotton was used to make the model of this dish towel a video tutorial is available for this pattern https //youtu be/y0htgc8bs40 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sophia-dishcloth 2 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
